EmailTemplate.name: 201706_Canada_Email_DoubleOptIn_mih.201706_Canada_Confirmation_DoubleOptIn_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Subscription Confirmation - Honeywell Aerospace
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> SUBSCRIPTION CONFIRMATION Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
You have successfully subscribed to {{lead.Option 1 or 2:default=Honeywell Aerospace e-communication}}. Please click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_THANKYOU_Subscription.html]]> to confirm that you have received this email.
Thank you for your subscription!
Honeywell Aerospace
